weapons.name: Ace of Spades
weapons.description:
Radar remains active while ADS.
Enhanced Firefly deals a maximum of 379 [80?] Damage, down to a minimum of 30% [?] Damage over 7.5 meters, with Damage Falloff Start at 3.75m.
Upon finishing a reload within 3.6 seconds of a kill:
Grants x6 Memento Mori bullets.
Firing consumes a stack of Memento Mori per shot, granting 68% [29%] increased damage and 15% Decreased Damage Falloff Distance.
Memento Mori is removed on stow. Reload Trigger persists through stow.
↑Funeral Pyre:
Firefly damage is increased by 25% [57?%] while Memento Mori is active.

weapons.name: Ager's Scepter
weapons.description:
Intrinsically has a 1.3x PVE Bonus over Legendary Trace Rifles.
Kills trigger a Stasis Burst, inflicting x100 [x50] Slow Stacks to enemies within 10 meters.
Stasis Kills refill 10 Ammo.
↑Will Given Form: Hold [Reload] to activate Alternate Firing Mode while at Full Super Energy.
Immediately drains 20% Super Energy, then constantly drains 4% Super Energy per Second.
Overflows magazine to 192 from reserves, and grants 80% increased damage. 
Hits inflict x20 [x0] Slow Stacks for 4+0 seconds 
Effect lasts until Magazine is emptied, Super Energy runs out, or if Ager's Scepter is stowed.
No, it does not benefit from Super Stat >100, or any other Super Ability Damage increase!

weapons.name: Arbalest
weapons.typeString: Special Ammo Kinetic Precision Linear Fusion Rifle
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Shield-Piercing Breaker.
Fires a single shield-piercing Precision Slug that deals 462 [132] Kinetic Damage with a 3.44x [4.3x] Precision Multiplier.
Shield-Piercing Slug instantly destroys Barrier Champion's Shield and Combatant Elemental Shields on hit.
Kinetic Vulnerability from Disruption Break applies to Arbalest.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +20 Handling, +1 Magazine Size (5 -> 6), and the Genesis trait.

weapons.name: Bad Juju
weapons.description:
Kills refill Magazine and grant a stack of String of Curses for 5.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
String of Curses grants increased damage and additional Super Energy on kill.
String of Curses persists through stow.
String of Curses
20% | 40% | 60% | 80% | 100% Increased Damage
10% | 20% | 30% | 40% | 50% Increased Damage
0.8% | 1.1% | 1.4% | 1.7% | 2% Additional Super Energy
Upon scoring 3 kills within 7.5? seconds of each without reloading or stowing Bad Juju:
Triggers a Cursed Explosion, dealing up to 305 [?] Kinetic Damage over ? meters.
Explosion Kills count towards the kill counter. String of Curses damage buff applies to the Explosion Damage.
↑Unending Curse:
String of Curses duration is increased to 7.5 seconds.

weapons.name: Bastion
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Unstoppable Breaker.
Fires a 3-round burst of 7 pellets each.
Deals 104 [31.2] damage per pellet x 7 = 728 [218.4] per burst x 3 = 2184 [655.2] damage per ammo spent.
Upon scoring 18? pellets in a burst:
Grants 300% [100%?] increased Melee Damage for the next Melee Hit within 3 seconds.
Upon dealing Melee Damage:
45% increased damage, +? Reload Speed, and 0.85x Charge Time Multiplier for 8.5 seconds.
Additional Melee Damage refreshes Saint's Fury duration. 
Buff is removed on stow.

weapons.name: Borealis
weapons.description:
[Reload] switches between the Arc, Solar, and Void Elements.
Chosen element persists through stow and death. Defaults to Void Element.
Grants 30% [10%] increased damage for 10 seconds upon inflicting or receiving an Elemental Effect that matches the currently selected Element.
Breaking a Matching Shield refills Magazine and grants 5 stacks of Ionic Return, up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
Guardians in their Super Ability count as having an Elemental Shield that matches the element of their Super.
Shooting consumes an Ionic Return stack, granting 15% increased damage and increasing the Precision Multiplier offset to 136/51 (or the Multiplier by +0.6667, or 19% Increased Precision Damage, on top of the previously mentioned 15%).
Breaking a Matching Shield while Ionic Return is active grants 5 Ionic Return stacks.
Ionic Return shots persist through stow and reloads.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +20 Reload Speed.

weapons.name: Buried Bloodline
weapons.description:
Fires two tracking bolts per shot, each dealing 263 [42.3] Void Damage with a 1.2x Precision Multiplier.
Each bolt restores 11 HP upon scoring a hit.
Kills progress a counter that grants Devour upon reaching 100%. Counter has no timer. Kills will not count while Devour is active.
Rank-And-File = 25% | Elite+ = 100% | Guardians = 25%
↑Splitvein Lineage: 
While Devour is active:
Hits inflict Weaken for 5 [?] seconds.
Grants +? Reload Speed and 0.?x Reload Duration Multiplier.

weapons.name: Centrifuse
weapons.description:
Refills 2 Ammo every 0.34 seconds while sprinting.
Sprinting, sliding, and shooting builds up charge, granting up to +? Range and +? Reload Speed. 
Shooting grants 20% Charge per second after holding down the trigger for 0.267 seconds.
Sprinting grants, after a 0.25 second delay, 20% Charge per second. Must be actively moving to build up charge.
Sliding grants 10% Charge per slide.
Charge decays at a rate of -33% per second after not doing any of those actions for 1.1 seconds. Manual Reloads automatically empty the charge.
Kills while at ≥40% Charge cause the enemy to explode, dealing up to 174 [76] Arc Damage in a 12 meter radius.
Explosions triggered while at 100% Charge blind enemies for 10 seconds.
↑Static Buildup:
Passively generates 7% Charge per second and removes Passive Decay while Amplified. Passive Charge is additive to Active Charge. Manual Reloads still empty the charge.

weapons.name: Cerberus +1
weapons.description:
Deals 85% of the damage of a High-Impact Auto Rifle.
Has reverse damage falloff at close ranges for both firing modes.  Deals 75% decreased damage to Stasis Crystals.
Each shot fires 4 evenly spread pellets in a triangular shape, with one always landing within the Accuracy Cone.
Each pellet deals up to 39 [20.4] damage with a 1.6x Precision Multiplier.
ADS grants -25% Pellet Spread.
Decreases damage dealt the closer an enemy is, up to a maximum of 16.67% Decreased Damage at point blank, scaling up to base damage at 14 metres. 
The ADS Damage Falloff Scalar of 1.6x increases the minimum distance to reach base damage to 22 meters.
↑Focused Fire: Hold [Reload] within 7 seconds of a kill to activate Focused Fire. Green Light displays when it's possible to swap firing modes.
Grants 50% [10%] increased damage and -30% Pellet Spread for 7 seconds.
Additional Weapon Kills while Focused Fire is active refresh its duration.
Focused Fire and Trigger Condition are removed on stow.

weapons.name: Choir of One
weapons.typeString: Craftable Special Ammo Void Command Frame Auto Rifle
weapons.description:
Projectiles despawn after ~100 meters.
Fanatical Lance is mechanically identical to Radiolaria Transponder, with massively increased damage.
Deals up to 721 [?] Void Damage with the explosion, and 140 [?] Arc Damage per tick with the Radiolaria Pool.
 Does not receive Origin Trait Enhancement from Artifact Perks.
While hipfiring:
Shoots a single projectile that splits into 5 slow-moving projectiles in a + pattern after 7.5 meters.
Initial projectile deals 100 [31] impact damage, and up to 899 [213] explosive damage over ? meters. Deals 10.5% increased damage compared to the split shot.
Each split projectile deals 18 [6] impact damage, and up to 180 [43] explosive damage over ? meters.
Consumes 5 Ammo per shot. Splits into fewer projectiles if Ammo <5. Does not deal self-damage.
While ADS:
Fires hitscan projectiles, each dealing 246 [40.25] damage with a 1.8x Precision Multiplier. 
Consumes 1 Ammo per shot.
↑Catalyst:
Grants the option to slot-in Destabilizing Rounds, Onslaught, and Subsistence trait equivalents.

weapons.name: Cloudstrike
weapons.description:
Upon scoring 3 Precision Hits within 6 seconds of each:
Grants x1 Bolt Charge.
Calls down a focused lightning strike that deals damage after 1.1 seconds, followed by a barrage of bolts after 0.5 seconds.
Focused Lightning Strikes deals up to 588 [300] damage over 5? meters.
Bolt Barrages is spread out in an X pattern and deals up to 353 [180] damage. Enemies can only be hurt once per barrage.
Precision Hit Counter is reset on stow.
Precision Kills instantly calls down a focused lightning strike and grant x5 Bolt Charge.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +25 Handling and the Triple Tap trait.

weapons.name: Coldheart
weapons.description:
Steadily grants up to 80% increased damage as Energy is accumulated.
Upon dealing damage:
Charges up 40% Energy/s for 1 second. 
Initial Charge has a 0.267 second delay before it starts incrementing. Not generating Energy for 1.05 seconds will remove all Energy over 0.2 seconds.
Upon picking up an Ionic Trace:
Slowly grants 50% Energy over 0.5 seconds.
While in the maximum damage state:
+100 Stability and +100 Reload Speed.
Hits spawn an Ionic Trace, with a 2 second cooldown.
↑Catalyst
Passively grants +20 Stability and +20 Reload Speed.

weapons.name: Collective Obligation
weapons.description:
Scoring 27 hits leeches Void Debuffs in the order of Volatile -> Weaken -> Suppression. 
Scoring a hit against an enemy affected by Void Debuffs, or being afflicted with a Void Debuff instantly leeches said debuffs for Void Leech Mode.
Void Leech Mode:
Scoring a hit charges 1.3% Energy (76 hits).  Hits against Void-Debuffed Enemies charge 16.7% Energy (6 hits). 
Scoring a kill against an enemy affected by Void Debuffs or being afflicted with a Void Debuff instantly charges Void Leech Mode.
Leeched Void Debuffs persist through stow. Void Leech Mode cannot be charged by self-applied debuffs.
Once charged, hold [Reload] to activate Void Leech for 15 [10] seconds.
Hits will inflict the Void Debuffs that were leeched and grants 20% increased damage.
Receiving Void Buffs refills Magazine. Reactivating Devour through kills also refills the magazine.

weapons.name: Conditional Finality
weapons.description:
Reloads both shells at once.
 Counts as a weapon for Harmonic Resonance, and benefits from the Handling and Reload Speed Increase from it.
While Ammo = 2:
Deals Stasis Damage. ▲ Pattern Spread. Intrinsic Overload Breaker.
 Scoring a hit with 10 out of the 12 pellets inflicts freeze.
Benefits from Stasis Mods.
While Ammo = 1 or 0:
Deals Solar Damage. ⬤ Pattern Spread. Intrinsic Unstoppable Breaker.
Scoring a hit with 10 out of the 12 pellets triggers an ignition.
Benefits from Solar Mods.

weapons.name: Crimson
weapons.description:
Allegedly shoots an illegal burst of 3 bullets, each dealing 62 [18] damage with a 1.85x Precision Multiplier.
Kills begin Health Regeneration and restore 32 HP.
Precision Kills refill the Magazine.
Catalyst:
Passively grants +20 Range.

weapons.name: Cryosthesia 77K
weapons.description:
Kills grant LN2 Burst Ready, enabling a Charged Shot Reload.
LN2 Burst Ready persists through stow.
Hold [Reload] while LN2 Burst Ready is active to perform a special reload that loads up a Charged Shot.
Charged Shot requires briefly charging for 0.53 seconds, and instantly freezes on direct hit. Enemies within 6? metres are applied freeze [x50 Slow].
Firing the Charged Shot, or stowing while Charged Shot is active reverts the firing mode to Sidearm Mode.
↑Cold Efficiency:
Scoring a Frozen Enemy Kill refills the Magazine.

weapons.name: Dead Man's Tale
weapons.description:
Loads 2 bullets at a time
Precision Hits grant a stack of Cranial Spike for 4 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
Stacks persist through stow.
Cranial Spike x1 | +8 Range, +2 Stability, 0.97x Reload Duration Multiplier, +4 Aim Assist, +1 Ammo Loaded, and 3.4% increased damage against Combatants.
Cranial Spike x2 | +16 Range, +4 Stability, 0.94x Reload Duration Multiplier, +8 Aim Assist, +2 Ammo Loaded, and 6.8% increased damage against Combatants.
Cranial Spike x3 | +24 Range, +6 Stability, 0.91x Reload Duration Multiplier, +12 Aim Assist, +3 Ammo Loaded, and 10.2% increased damage against Combatants.
Cranial Spike x4 | +32 Range, +8 Stability, 0.89x Reload Duration Multiplier, +16 Aim Assist, +4 Ammo Loaded, and 13.6% increased damage against Combatants.
Cranial Spike x5 | +40 Range, +10 Stability, 0.86x Reload Duration Multiplier, +20 Aim Assist, +5 Ammo Loaded, and 17% increased damage against Combatants.
↑Dark-Forged Trigger:
Passively grants 0.92x Hipfire Fire Recovery Delay, -50% Hipfire Accuracy Cone Size, and -?x Hipfire Accuracy Cone Growth. 
Prefers Crits over Bodyshots if Precision AA Cone overlaps.
Grants 27% [15%] increased Hipfire Damage while at x5 Cranial Spike.

weapons.name: Delicate Tomb
weapons.description:
Fires a 16-bolt burst. ADS overlaps each bolt into 2.
Hipfired Bolts deal 20% increased damage.
Kills have a chance to spawn an Ionic Trace. 
Rank-And-File = 10% | Elites+ = 100% | Guardians = 100%
Picking up an Ionic Trace grants Tempest Cascade.
Tempest Cascade grants the next shot 100% [7%] increased damage and Jolt on hit.
Tempest Cascade can be triggered while stowed, and persists through stow.
↑Ionic Interment:
Refills 4 Ammo upon picking up an Ionic Trace.

weapons.name: Devil's Ruin
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Unstoppable Breaker.
Kills spawn a Firesprite.
Picking up a Firesprite enables Pyrogenesis.
Pyrogenesis Ready persists through stow.
Hold [Reload] while Pyrogenesis is active to perform a special reload that loads up a High-Powered Laser.
High-Powered Laser:
Deals ? [?] Damage with a 1.6x Precision Multiplier, as well as inflicting x20+10 Scorch per hit up to ? times over 0.93 seconds.
Laser Kills trigger an ignition.

weapons.name: Divinity
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Overload Breaker. 
Deals half the damage of a regular Trace Rifle.
Fires a continuous beam that deals 15.3 [7.5] Arc Damage with a 1.34x Precision Multiplier at 900RPM.
Scoring 14 [5] hits within 0.15 seconds of each weakens, increasing damage taken by 15% [15%], and inflicting censured, creating a Precision Cage for 1.25 seconds. 
Shots that hit the Precision Cage are converted into into Precision Hits, but do not count as Weakspot Hits.
Weapons that cannot deal Precision Damage, such as Rocket Launchers and Fusion Rifles do not benefit from Precision Hits.
Divinity's weaken increases Divinity Damage by 30%.
 Enemies that remain in the Precision Field for 3.75 seconds suffer from Penance, receiving 1060 [520] damage. 
Penance's timer is increased to 4 seconds after the initial strike.

weapons.name: Duality
weapons.typeString: Solar Precision Pellet and Pinpoint Slug Revolver Shotgun
weapons.description:
Hipfire shoots pellets, while ADS shoots slugs. Passively has 5% Increased Damage Falloff Distance.
Reloads its entire magazine at once.
Upon scoring a Pellet Kill, or scoring a hit with 10? pellets:
Grants a stack of On Black Wings for 7 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 stacks.
On Black Wings increases Precision Damage and grants +? Reload Speed. 
Additional Pellet Kills or Slug Precision Hits refresh the On Black Wings duration to 8 seconds.
On Black Wings persists through stow.
On Black Wings:
23% | 39% | 55%
?% | | ?% | 47%
+? | +? | +? Reload Speed
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +20 Range and increases Magazine by 2 (6 -> 8).

weapons.name: Edge of Action
weapons.description:
After scoring 6 Hits, either through Projectile or Melee Damage:
Hold [Reload] to switch fire mode, fully consuming Weapon Energy to prepare a Gumdrop Protective Shield for the next shot, refilling the magazine and granting +1 Ammo.
Protective Shield:
Lasts 20 seconds and has 2,400 Construct HP with 85% Damage Resist against non-Boss Combatants, and 15% Damage Resist against Bosses.
Protective Shield blocks incoming and outgoing projectiles, preventing damage from the outside.
While in the Protective Shield: Grants a 45 HP Void Overshield for 10+5 seconds at a rate of once per second and Stat Boost for 10 seconds.
Stat Boost | +? Handling, +? Reload Speed, and 5% Increased Weapon Damage. Buff duration is refreshed while inside. 
Helm of Saint-14 confers its defensive bonuses to the Protective Shield.

weapons.name: Edge of Concurrence
weapons.description:
After scoring 6 Hits, either through Projectile or Melee Damage:
Hold [Reload] to switch fire mode, fully consuming Weapon Energy to prepare a Lightning Seeker for the next shot, refilling the magazine and granting +1 Ammo.
Lightning Seeker chases after the closest enemy within 32 metres, dealing 1440 [a lot] damage, inflicting Jolt, and releasing Chain Lightning on impact.
Chain Lightning damages up to 4 enemies within 10 metres, dealing 65 damage to each enemy.

weapons.name: Edge of Intent
weapons.description:
After scoring 6 Hits, either through Projectile or Melee Damage:
Hold [Reload] to switch fire mode, fully consuming Weapon Energy to prepare a Healing Turret for the next shot, refilling the magazine and granting +1 Ammo.
Healing Turret lasts 15 seconds and shoots Healing Seekers every 3 seconds to the user and allies within 30 meters.
Healing Seekers bestow x1 Cure and x1 Restoration for 4+3 [3+1.5] seconds in a 7.5 metre radius.
Cure and Restoration are increased to x2 while Touch of Flame is equipped.

weapons.name: Ergo Sum
weapons.description:
Drops with a random Sword Frame and Exotic Intrinsic. Impact Stat has no effect on perk damage.
Kills grant an additional 2.5% Light Transcendent Energy and 2.5% Dark Transcendent Energy.
While Transcendent:
Grants 44% increased damage and +50 Charge Rate.
Exotic Intrinsic Effects (Wolfpack, Perfect Fifth, Arc Conductor, Unplanned Reprieve, etc) are instead granted 20% increased damage.
Dealing any Sword Damage triggers the increased Prismatic Grenade Regeneration Speed.
Extends Transcendent duration by an additional ?% kill.
↑Transcendent Steel:
Grants +3 [+1] Ammo upon scoring a Prismatic Grenade Hit. 
Ammo Generation is on specific parts of each Prismatic Grenade. TBD.

weapons.name: Ergo Sum
weapons.description:
Kills grant a stack of Gathering Light.
Gathering Light grants 10%? Increased Lunge Distance, +? Guard Resistance, and +? Guard Endurance.
Stowing the weapon consumes all stacks, granting 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy per stack.
Wolfpack Rounds
Powered Grounded Heavy Attacks grant Pack Hunter for 10 seconds to Legendary Swords and other Ergo Sum wielders. 
 Wolfpack Rounds are released loosely around their spawn location and track towards enemies, dealing 32 [11] impact and up to 68 [23] explosive damage.
Wolfpack Rounds damage can be increased through Damage Perks and Buffs. Wolfpack Hits count as Sword Hits.
Grounded and Airborne Powered Light attacks release 1 Wolfpack Round, while Grounded Powered Heavy Attacks release 3 Wolfpack Rounds.
Airborne Heavy Attacks do not spawn any Wolfpack Rounds.
Caster: Releases 3 Wolfpack Rounds around the projectile impact area.
Lightweight & Adaptives: No effect on the Heavy Attack that triggers Pack Hunter. Heavy Attacks while Pack Hunter is active release 3 Wolfpack Rounds forward.
Vortex: Releases 3 Wolfpack Rounds as the Heavy Attack animation finishes.
Wave: Releases 3 Wolfpack Rounds at the end of the shockwave. Homing Strike does not release any Wolfpack Rounds.

weapons.name: Ergo Sum
weapons.typeString: Continuation of the Ergo Sum Exotic, for traits that are only available on Arc Element variations.
weapons.description:
Arc Conductor
Powered Heavy Attacks grant Arc Conductor for 6 seconds.
Arc Conductor grants 50?% [15%] Arc Damage Resist.
While Arc Conductor is active, releases chain lightning to enemies within ? metres.
Chain Lightning deals 180 [26] Arc Damage. Repeated strikes on a single target occur every 1.5 seconds.
 Lightning is treated as a Sword Projectile for Damage Scaling purposes. Buff is removed on stow.
Stormbringer
Scoring 3 kills within ? seconds of each creates a lightning storm centered on the enemy.

weapons.name: Eriana's Vow
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Shield-Piercing Breaker.
Fires a single Shield-Piercing bullet that deals 594 [77] Solar Damage with 1.6x Precision Multiplier.
Death At First Glance grants 32.5% increased damage for the first scoped shot.
Precision Hits and Hits against Combatant Shields maintain Death At First Glance. 
Death At First Glance reactivates after 3 seconds of not firing.
Breaking a Solar Shield or Barrier Champion's Shield triggers an Ignition.
Guardians in their Super Ability count as having an Elemental Shield that matches the element of their Super.
Deals 67% increased damage against Barrier Champions.
Ignition damage is also increased by 67% against the Barrier Champion.
↑More to Give:
Passively grants +3 Magazine Size (6 -> 9) and an Auto-Loading Holster trait equivalent.

weapons.name: Euphony
weapons.typeString: Special Ammo Strand Adaptive Burst Linear Fusion Rifle
weapons.description:
Scoring 6 hits within ? seconds of each spawns 3 Threadlings.
Scoring a Precision Kill spawns 1 Threadling.
Threadling hits grant a stack of Spindle, up to x25 stacks for 10 seconds.
 Spindle grants 2% increased damage, +? Handling, and +? Reload Speed per stack, up to 50% increased damage, +? Handling, and +? Reload Speed at x25 stacks.
Additional Threadling or Euphony Hits refresh the Spindle duration.
Spindle can be stacked and remains active while stowed.

weapons.name: Final Warning
weapons.description:
Projectiles despawn after 50 metres.
While holding down the trigger:
Enemies within 24 metres are marked over 0.5 seconds for 2 seconds, and gradually charges up a 10-round burst over 0.9 seconds. Burst-Fire has +30 Stability.
Fully-Charged Burst Hits inflict Unravel to marked enemies.
Projectiles deal 116 [25] damage with a 1.4x Precision Multiplier, and have different behaviors depending on whether it is hipfired or aimed-down-sights.
While Hipfiring:
Shoots slower-moving Tracking Rounds which aggressively seek marked enemies.
Marked Enemies receive 20% Increased Bodyshot Damage.
While ADS:
Shoots hitscan projectiles.
 Marked Enemies receive 100% Increased Precision Damage.
↑String Theory:
10% increased damage towards Marked Enemies. Marked Miniboss and Boss Combatants only receive 5% increased damage.
Hits against Marked Enemies have a chance to refill 1 Ammo.
Rank-and-File and Elites = ~85% | Minibosses+ = 25%

weapons.name: Forerunner
weapons.description:
Fires extended-range, heavy-caliber rounds that deal 104 [42] damage with a 1.85x Precision Multiplier. 
Deals 181% Increased Precision Damage against Combatants.
Firing semiautomatically grants -33?% Recoil, -?% Accuracy Cone Growth and -?% Accuracy Cone Size. Impossible to obtain Accuracy numbers due to the gun's reticle.
↑The Rock: Hold [Reload] within 4 seconds of a Weapon Kill, while having at least 4 Ammo to replaces Grenade Ability with a Kinetic-Damage Fragmentation Grenade.
Fragmentation Grenade deals up to 2072 [181] damage in a 9 metre radius and follows a Medium Arc Trajectory.
Explosion deals a minimum of 20% damage at maximum falloff. Explosion deals 75?% Decreased Self-Damage. 
Has a 0.6 second fuse timer that begins as soon as movement is slowed enough.
Fragmentation Grenade counts as a Grenade Ability, and will activate any effect associated with Grenade Kills or Grenade Ability Usage.
The Rock persists through stow, and is only removed on Grenade Usage.

weapons.name: Graviton Lance
weapons.description:
Decreased RPM of 300 instead of the usual Heavy Burst's 324RPM.
The 1st round of a burst deals 15% decreased damage but has no recoil.
The 2nd round of a burst deals 35.294118% increased damage, has no damage falloff, and has recoil.
Total damage per burst matches that of a Heavy Burst Pulse Rifle.
Kills fling enemies backwards and trigger a Void Explosion that deals up to 437 [100] damage over 5? meter radius and releases 2 seeking Void orbs.
Seeking Void Orbs each deal up to 67 [20?] damage on explosion.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +20 Range, the Turnabout trait, and the Vorpal Weapon trait.

weapons.name: Graviton Spike
weapons.typeString: Craftable Arc + Stasis Modal Hand Cannon
weapons.description:
[Reload] to swap between 150RPM Arc Firing Mode and 95RPM Stasis Firing Mode, refilling 3 Ammo.
Scoring a combined total of 3 Kills and Precision Hits within 7 seconds of each grants Overcharge to the opposite element.
Overcharge progress persists through stow and reload, but is cleared upon swapping firing modes.
Overcharge begins passively draining at a rate of -4.5% per second upon fully charging, even while stowed. 
150RPM Arc Mode:
Fires bullets that deal 129 [42.03] Damage with a 1.85x Precision Multiplier.
Arc Overcharge:
Kills and Precision Hits call down a lightning strike, dealing up to 238 + 219 = 457 [? + ? = ?] Arc Damage over ? meters.
Each Precision Hit consumes 34% Arc Overcharge.
95RPM Stasis Mode:
Fires explosive bullets that deal 169 [43.2] Impact Damage and up to 136 [21.02] Explosive Damage with a 1.85x Precision Multiplier.
Stasis Overcharge:
 Kills and Precision Hits trigger a Stasis Explosion that deals up to 115 [?] Damage over ? meters and create 2 seekers perpendicular to the target.
Seekers spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal rotated 45 degrees away from the enemy after traveling 4 meters, forming a \  / shape.
Each Precision Hit consumes 34% Stasis Overcharge.
↑Catalyst grants multiple craftable traits:
Temporal Alignment Refit grants 20% [?%] increased damage for 16 seconds upon triggering both Arc and Stasis overcharge. 
Triggering the buff has no time limit, and the buff can be refreshed by overcharging both modes in the same order it was activated in.
Rapid Hit trait.
Subsistence trait.
Transcendent Moment trait.

weapons.name: Hard Light
weapons.description:
[Reload] switches between the Arc, Solar, and Void Elements.
Chosen element persists through stow and death. Defaults to Void Element.
Grants 30% [10%] increased damage for 10 seconds upon inflicting or receiving an Elemental Effect that matches the currently selected Element.
Damage Falloff End stops at 0.7x instead of the usual 0.5x for Auto Rifles.
Bullets can ricochet up two times from sharper angles.
Bullets that have ricochet at least once deal 100% [35%] increased damage.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +25 Stability.

weapons.name: Hawkmoon
weapons.description:
Precision Hits or Kills grants a stack of Paracausal Charge.
Paracausal Charge grants increased damage against Combatants. based on the amount of stacks.
x1 = 21% | x2 = 36.5% | x3 = 47.6% | x4 = 55.3% | x5 = 59.8% | x6 = 63.2% | x7 = 66.3%
Paracausal Charge stacks are removed on reload, upon fully refilling the magazine, or upon stowing while at either 1 Ammo left, or while at Paracausal Charge ≥6 stacks.
The Final Round in the magazine consumes all Paracausal Charge stacks to deal increased damage based on the amount of stacks. 
The damage buff from Paracausal Charge does NOT apply to the Final Round damage.
Paracausal Shot's Final Round Damage Increase:
292% | 300% | 340% | 425% | 667% | 1071% | 1736%
30% | 33% | 45.7% | 80.5% | 154.3% | 288% | 508.6%
Weapon can get different rolls from Xûr.
↑Hunter's Trance:
Passively grants +1 Magazine Size (8 -> 9).
Grants increased Range, Handling, and Reload Speed as Paracausal Shot stacks increase.
+8 | +14 | +22 | +26 | +28 | +29 | +30 Range
+? | +? | +? | +? | +? | +? | +? Handling
+15 | +25 | +35 | +40 | +50 | +50? | +50? Reload Speed

weapons.name: Hierarchy of Needs
weapons.description:
Direct Hits grant a Guidance Ring charge, up to a maximum of 3 charges. 
Guidance Ring charges persist through stow.
Guidance Ring:
Spawned by firing a fully-drawn hipfired shot while at x3 Guidance Ring Charges.
 Guidance Ring lasts for 20 seconds and rotates to face its owner. Only one Guidance Ring may exist at once across all players.
ALL Arrows that pass through a Guidance Ring release 3 seeking explosive projectiles, which deal up to 192 [15] damage.
Seeking Projectiles that travel over 40 meters deal 50% [~15-20% Guardians | 50% Constructs] increased damage. Seeking Projectiles dissipate after traveling 80 metres.
Shadowshot and Buried Bloodline will also shoot out seeking projectiles.
↑Panoptic Tessellation:
0.5x Draw Time Multiplier, 100? Reload Speed, and ? Reload Duration Multiplier for 5 seconds after deploying a Guidance Ring or scoring a hit with a seeking projectile.
Additional seeking projectile hits or redeploying a Guidance Ring refresh the buff duration.

weapons.name: Ice Breaker
weapons.description:
Does not hold reserve ammo. Only has an automatically refilling magazine.
Fires at 49 RPM (1.47x Fire Recovery Delay) and deals 47% increased damage against Combatants compared to a Legendary Aggressive Sniper Rifle.
Kills or assists scored with any other weapon or ability generate Ammo.
Rank-and-File = +1 Ammo every 2 Kills | Elite = +2 Ammo | Miniboss+ = +3 Ammo | Guardians = +? Ammo
Non-Precision Kills, or shattering a Stasis Crystal triggers a Solar Explosion, dealing up to 480 [40] Solar Damage over ? meters. 
Scoring a Precision Kill, shattering a Frozen Enemy, or scoring a hit against a stunned Barrier Champion triggers an ignition.
↑Icing Breaker:
Hits against enemies affected by Stasis Debuffs generates +1 Ammo:
Every other hit generates Ammo.
Every 10? seconds, the first hit always generates Ammo.

weapons.name: Izanagi's Burden
weapons.description:
Hold [Reload] to perform a slower Reload that consumes up to 4 Ammo and grants a single, high-damage Honed Edge shot.
Honed Edge persists through stow until it is fired.
Honed Edge x2 = 12% [20%] Increased Damage and +1.92 Precision Multiplier. Total: 79% [91%]
Honed Edge x3 = 25% [45%] Increased Damage and +2.74 Precision Multiplier. Total: 131% [167%]
Honed Edge x4 = 112% [165%] Increased Damage and +2.74 Precision Multiplier. Total: 291% [389%]
↑Peerless Edge x4 = 155% [218%] Increased Damage and +2.74 Precision Multiplier. Total: 370% [487%]
Honed Edge's Reload Animation Speed is the same as a regular reload's.
↑Peerless Edge:
Honed Edge x4's Damage Increase is multiplied by 1.2x.

weapons.name: Jötunn
weapons.description:
Fires an explosive projectile that tracks enemies and detonates on impact.
Explosion creates a small burning spot, dealing 31 [8] damage every 0.25 seconds up to 7 times.
↑Catalyst:
Grants the Cornered trait and the Incandescent trait.

weapons.name: Khvostov 7G-0X
weapons.description:
Picking up an Orb of Power grants x7 stacks of Eyes Up, Guardian. (A full magazine worth of enhanced ricochets)
Eyes Up, Guardian stacks persist through stow.
Every shot in the magazine divisible by 7 fires a ricochetting bullet that deals 252.52% [5% Guardians | 252.52% Constructs] increased damage with +50% Auto Aim Cone Size.
Rounds that ricochet off of enemies bounce towards the closest enemy within 8? [5?] meters, dealing 108 [4.6] damage.
Firing a ricochetting round while Eyes Up, Guardian is active consumes a stack, enhancing the ricochetting bullet.
Enhanced Ricochetting Bullets bounce up to 7 times between enemies within 12? [?] meters. Enemies can only be damaged twice by the same ricochetting bullet.

weapons.name: Le Monarque
weapons.description:
Grants Lightweight Frame bonuses.
Intrinsic Overload Breaker.
Perfectly-drawn arrows poison enemies and stun Overload Champions.
Perfectly-drawn Precision Hits trigger a poison burst, poisoning and disrupting enemies within 3? metres.
Poison:
Begins dealing damage after 0.55 seconds of being inflicted.
Deals 46 [2.5] Void Damage every 0.25 seconds up to 6 times over 1.35 seconds, totalling 276 [15] damage.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +30 Stability, +20 Reload Speed, and the Unrelenting trait.

weapons.name: Lodestar
weapons.typeString: Primary Ammo Burst-Fire Arc Trace Rifle
weapons.description:
Hold [Reload] to quickly activate Arc Alignment once it is fully charged. 
Arc Alignment can be cancelled by holding [Reload] to preserve the remaining charge.
Hipfire | Becomes an Adaptive Trace Rifle.
Deals 85% of the damage of a Special Ammo Adaptive Trace Rifle.
ADS | Becomes a Rapid-Fire Pulse Rifle.
Deals 30% increased damage against Arc-Debuffed Enemies, and causes them to explode on death, dealing up to 395 [?] Arc Damage and inflicting blind over ? meters.
Scoring Arc Hits charges up Arc Alignment.
Hipfire Mode = 1% Charge | ADS Mode = 3% Charge | Non-Lodestar Arc Hits = 1% Charge
Arc Alignment:
Automatically refills the magazine upon triggering and grants -75%? Recoil.
Drains at a rate of ~14% Energy per second, ending after 7 seconds. Drain persists through stow.
Hipfire inflicts Jolt on hit.
ADS reduces drain rate by 67%, down to per second, increasing the duration to a maximum of 20 seconds.
↑Supercharged Matrix:
 While Amplified:
+? Reload Speed, +10? Aim Assist, and ?% Decreased ADS Movement Speed Penalty..

weapons.name: Lord of Wolves
weapons.description:
Reloads its entire magazine at once.
Fires in short-range 5-round bursts.
While hipfiring (Release The Wolves):
Deals 175 [39.9] Solar Damage per bullet with a 1.6x Precision Multiplier.
-? Range, 0.4?x Fire Recovery Delay, and +200?% Accuracy Cone Size. Becomes automatic.
While ADS:
Deals 126 [21] Solar Damage per bullet with a 1.89x Precision Multiplier.
↑Fang and Claw. Passively grants +20 Stability, +60 Reload Speed and .85x Reload Duration Multiplier:
Hipfired Shots inflict x10+5 Scorch upon dealing damage Incurs a 0.5? second cooldown between Scorch applications.
Aimed Shots trigger a Scorching Explosion on kill, inflicting x30+10 Scorch to enemies within 8? meters.
Solar Effects that are initially applied by Lord of Wolves deal 110% increased damage and its damage can be increased by Weapon Buffs.

weapons.name: Lorentz Driver
weapons.typeString: Special Ammo Void Precision Linear Fusion Rifle
weapons.description:
Fires a single Precision Bolt that deals 402 [132] Void Damage with a 3.44x [4.3x] Precision Multiplier.
Precision Kills trigger an implosion that pulls enemies within 9 [?] metres in and then explodes, dealing up to 301 [?] damage.
While at least 3 non-Miniboss+ enemies are within 50 meters: 
Targets the farthest enemy, marking them through walls [highlighting them] until either killed or over 80 meters away.
Marked Enemies spawn a Telemetry Pattern on death.
Incurs a 7 second cooldown between marking enemies. 
 Telemetry Patterns:
Pickups that grant +1 Ammo and last up to 60 seconds on the ground.
Telemetry Patterns stacks are removed on death.
Upon picking up x3 Telemetry Patterns | Grants Lagrangian Sight for 30 seconds and +6 Ammo.
Picking up additional Telemetry Patterns refresh the buff duration to 30 seconds. 
Lagrangian Sight grants 50% [87.5%] increased damage, +30 Handling, and +35 Reload Speed. 
Precision Multiplier against Guardians is decreased to 3.44x while Lagrangian Sight is active.
↑Jump Driver:
Passively grants an Enhanced Radar while Lorentz Driver is readied.
While at x3 Telemetry Patterns, any kill triggers an implosion.

weapons.name: Lumina
weapons.description:
Kills create a floating Remnant that homes in towards the user while within 10 metres. 
Remnants refill 4 Ammo and grant 1 Noble Round on pickup, up to a maximum of 6 Noble Rounds. Boots of the Assembler' Noble Seekers grant 1 Noble Rounds.
Noble Round stacks persist through stow.
Hipfiring releases a Noble Round, which aggressively seeks the closest ally.
Noble Rounds restore 90 HP to the ally, and grant Blessing of the Sky to both the wielder and the ally.
Blessing of the Sky:
35% [15%] increased damage and +100 Class Stat for 11 seconds.
↑Resonant Virtue:
Kills now create 2 Remnants.

weapons.name: Malfeasance
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Unstoppable Breaker.
Hits embed Explosive Slugs on the enemy for 6 seconds. Slugs expire harmlessly individually.
Embedding 5 slugs on an enemy causes the slugs to explode, each dealing 203 [45] damage per slug and stunning Unstoppable Champions.
Embedded slugs also explode on death.
Deals 25% Increased damage against Gambit Invaders and Taken Combatants.
Deals 25% Increased damage against Combatants that are directly struck by Witherhoard's Blight.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +20 Range and the Vorpal Weapon trait.

weapons.name: Merciless
weapons.description:
Kills grant .66x Reload Duration Multiplier for 6 seconds.
Hits grant a stack of Conserve Momentum for 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 15 stacks.
 Additional hits refresh the Conserve Momentum duration. Buff persists through reloads.
Conserve Momentum:
Grants decreased Charge Time and Damage.
Begins at 0.93x Charge Time Multiplier and 0.84% decreased damage, scaling down to a 0.2x Charge Time Multiplier (216ms) and 11.93% decreased damage after 15 hits. 
Upon finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a kill:
Grants 50% increased damage for 4.5 seconds.
Damage buff persists through stow.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +40 Range and +40 Stability.

weapons.name: MIDA Multi-Tool
weapons.description:
Grants Lightweight Frame bonuses. MIDA Synergy Weapons inherit the Movement Bonus.
Grants 12.5% Increased Movement Speed while readied.
Radar remains active while ADS.
Scoring kills with MIDA Multi-tool and other weapons with MIDA Synergy traits progresses the 4-stage Software Update counter.
Primary MIDA Weapons grant 10% [100%] Current Stage Progress (2.5% [?%] towards maximum) | Special MIDA Weapons = 6.7% [50%] Current Stage Progress (1.67% [12.5%] towards maximum)
Dying sets the Software Update counter to the beginning of the previous stage.
Software Update: Incremental buffs that stack with the previous stages. Combatant Damage Buff is the total increase.
Chip | 0.75x Handling Duration Multiplier and 4.8% increased damage towards Combatants.
Barrel | +15 Range and +15 Stability and 9.6% increased damage towards Combatants.
Optics | 15% Increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance, 5% Increased Auto Aim Cone Angle, and 14.4% increased damage towards Combatants.
Ammo | Shots explode on impact, dealing an additional instance of up to 19 [7] Damage over 3 meters and 14.4% increased damage towards Combatants.
↑Vital Intel: While an enemy is within 15 meters:
Enhanced Radar, +20 Reload Speed, and 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier.
 Buff lingers for 4 seconds once criteria isn't met.

weapons.name: Monte Carlo
weapons.description:
Hits grant 2% Melee Energy.
Kills grant a stack of Markov Chain for 4.5 seconds, up to 5 stacks, and have a 25% chance to grant 100% Fixed Melee Ability Energy. 
Melee Kills refill magazine and grant 5 stacks.
Markov Chain:
13% | 26% | 39% | 52% | 65% Increased Damage
6.6% | 13.2% | 19.8% | 26.4% | 33% Increased Damage
↑Bayonet Locked: Hold [Reload] while at Markov Chain x5 to replace Melee Ability with a Bayonet for a single Melee Attack. Bayonet counts as an Unpowered Melee Attack.
Bayonet Melee Attacks deal 2,772 [140] damage, grant 50% Fixed Melee Ability Energy, and increases Melee Lunge Distance to 7 metres.
Bayonet Ready persists through stow.

weapons.name: Necrochasm
weapons.description:
Counts as a Weapon of Sorrow.
On Precision Kill, or upon scoring a Cursed Thrall Explosion Kill, or upon killing a Poisoned Enemy:
Grants +70? Reload Speed and 0.9?x Reload Duration Multiplier for ? seconds.
Triggers a Cursed Thrall Explosion, dealing up to 581 [130?] Arc Damage and inflicting Poison in a ? meter radius. 
Cursed Thrall Explosion Kills refill Magazine.
Poison deals 10 [0.4?] damage every 0.5 seconds for 3.5 [2] seconds.
Cursed Thrall Explosion and Poison scale with Combatant Rank Multipliers.
Fun Fact: Cursed Thrall (Hive Combatants) deal 250 damage against Combatants.
Upon finishing a reload within ? seconds of a Precision Kill, or upon scoring a Cursed Thrall Explosion Kill:
0.8x Fire Recovery Delay Multiplier, +6? Stability, +10-15? Aim Assist for 7 seconds.
↑One for Thrall:
Damaging 3 enemies within 3 seconds of each grants 35% increased damage, +? Range, and +? Aim Assist for 10 seconds.
One For Thrall can be reactivated by damaging 3 enemies again, and persists through stow.

weapons.name: New Land Beyond
weapons.description:
Fires a bullet that deals 1,025 [155] Kinetic Damage with a 3.19x Precision Multiplier, followed by a rechamber that scales based on the Reload Speed.
Rechamber animation can be skipped following the "clink" noise by sprinting, allowing for considerably faster fire rate.
Rechamber Speed:
Base Rechamber Speed allows firing every 1.834 seconds.
Bullseye Bolster allows firing every 1.49 seconds.
100 Reload Speed allows firing every 1.35 seconds.
 100 Reload Speed + Bullseye Bolster allows firing every 1.275 seconds.
100 Reload Speed + Rechamber Cancelling + Bullseye Bolster allows firing every ~1.05 seconds.
Upon scoring a Precision Hit:
Grants a stack of The Master, up to a maximum of 100 until death.
+? Stability, +? Handling, +40 Reload Speed, +? Aim Assist, and 0.95x Fire Recovery Delay? for 3 seconds or until firing and not scoring a Precision Hit.
The Master:
Grants increased Precision Damage, up to 70% at 20 stacks. 
15.7% | 22.2% | 27% | 31.3% | 35% x5
38.4% | 41.4% | 44.3% | 47% | 49.5% x10
51.9% | 54.2% | 56.5% | 58.6% | 60.7% x15
62.64% | 64.56% | 66.42% | 68.23% | 70% x20
Renames to The Grandmaster upon reaching 20 stacks, slowly increasing up to 73% over 100 stacks. Shots visually explode while at 20+ stacks.
 Transforms into THE GRANDERMASTER at 100 stacks. Transforms into The Chief Master at 999 stacks.
↑Top Tier Mastery: While at >20 Master stacks:
Magazine is constantly refilled, effectively removing reloading requirements.
Bullseye Bolster duration is increased to ? seconds.

weapons.name: New Malpais
weapons.typeString: Strand Special Ammo Micro-Missile Pulse Rifle
weapons.description:
Hold [Reload] to manually detonate all embedded projectiles.
Fires a 3-round burst of sticky projectiles that embed themselves to enemies and surfaces they hit, each dealing 151 [?] Impact Damage.
Projectiles detonate upon holding [Reload] or after being embed for 6 seconds, detonating for up to 357 [?] Explosive Damage over 6 meters.
Manually triggering the detonation of 6 embedded projectiles on a single enemy inflicts Suspension.
↑Unraveling Blast: Explosive Damage from Enemy-Embedded Projectiles now inflicts Unravel.

weapons.name: No Time to Explain
weapons.description:
Precision Hits and Hits against enemies affected by Stasis grant a stack of Rewind Again and refill 1 Ammo.
Reaching 10 stacks summons a Time-slip Portal for 9 seconds. Precision Hits refresh its duration by 1 second.
Rewind Again stacks persist through stow.
Time-slip Portal:
 Shoots a burst of 3 bullets every 1.25 seconds towards enemies within 40 metres that are near the reticle.
Each bullet deals 46.1 [10.2] damage, has no damage falloff, inherits No Time To Explain's Breaker-Type, and scales with Combatant Rank Multipliers.
Time-slip Portal is removed on stow.
↑Blast from the Side: 
Time-slip Portal burst delay is decreased to 0.85 seconds.

weapons.name: Outbreak Perfected
weapons.description:
Uses Auto Rifle Recoil Animations.
Scoring 12 Hits within 1? seconds of each spawns 2–3 nanites.
Precision Kills spawn 9 nanites. 
Nanites:
Tracking Projectiles that chase after enemies within ? meters, dealing 60 [13] damage on impact and embedding themselves for 9 seconds. 
Nanites that haven't embedded on an enemy begin disappearing after 3 seconds. Embedding additional nanites refreshes the duration to 9 seconds.
Outbreak Perfected deals increased damage to enemies with nanites based on the amount of nanites.
x1 = 30% [15%] | x2 = 60% [30%] | x3 = 90% [45%] | x4 = 120% [75%] | x5 = 150% [?%] | x100 = 350% [?%]
Each Nanite after the fifth increases the damage buff by 2.1%, up to 350% [?%] at x100 Nanites.
Nanited Enemies are highlighted on Outbreak's scope. Does not work for all ornaments.
↑Disease Vector:
Grants 25% Increased Nanite impact damage.
Nanited Enemies release 4 Disease Vector Nanites on death.
Disease Vector Nanites deal 13 [?] damage.

weapons.name: Polaris Lance
weapons.description:
Precision Hits refill 1 Ammo.
Scoring 4 Precision Hits readies an Explosive Solar Round that deals up to 198 [78] damage and inflicts x40+20 Scorch to enemies within 2? metres. 
Reloading or not shooting after 6 seconds of reading the Explosive Solar Round resets the Precision Hit Counter. Precision Hit Counter persists through stow.
↑Catalyst:
Grants the Dragonfly trait.

weapons.name: Praxic Blade
weapons.description:
Modifiable Tangs, Grips, Traits, Mods, and Catalysts.
Intrinsic Shield-Piercing Breaker. 
Deals 50% increased damage towards Combatant Shields, and 200% increased damage towards Barrier Shields.
Defensive Form for base damage values against Elites, as it has no damage bonuses.
[Light Attack] performs a Melee Combo, with each hit dealing 479 [256] Kinetic Damage. Melee Attacks can discharge Bolt Charge.
Using [Heavy Attack] after performing 3 [Light Attacks] executes a Cormorant Combo.
Cormorant Combo deals 689 [?] Kinetic Damage, followed by 3 damage instances of 417 [?] Kinetic Damage, totalling 1940 [lol] damage.
[Heavy Attack Press] performs a Ranged Attack, throwing the blade forward up to 50 meters away, homing towards up to 3 enemies before returning.
Deals 945 [174] Kinetic Damage per hit. Damage is reduced by 80% when returning. Attacking recalls the blade.
[Heavy Attack Hold] throws the blade on a straight path forward, dealing 100% increased damage. [Heavy Attack Release] to recall the blade.
[Blocking] grants 100% [?%] Damage Resist against all damage in a ?° cone.
Blocking a hit retaliates by reflecting a Crystal-Color Matching Bolt that deals 255 [50] Kinetic Damage towards the reticle.
-------------
Balanced Form | Scoring 3 Melee Attack Kills within 5 seconds of each grants +2 Ammo, restores 65 HP, and begins Health Regeneration. 
Deals 10% increased damage against Rank-and-File and Elite Combatants. Technically 11.2% due to impact stat shift.
Defensive Form | Blocking an attack within 1 seconds of beginning to block grants 20% increased damage for 2 seconds.
Blocking an attack grants +1 Ammo, up to once per second.
Offensive Form | Scoring 3 damage instances within ? seconds of each grants +1 Ammo.
Deals 15% increased damage against Bosses and Vehicles.

weapons.name: Prometheus Lens
weapons.description:
Solar Effects that are initially applied by Prometheus Lens deal 10% increased damage.
After 0.45 seconds of holding down the trigger:
Creates an expanding Scorching Field, that fully expands to a 1 metre radius over 4 seconds.
Scorching Field deals 13.47 [6] damage every 0.1 seconds, and applies Scorch at the same rate as the beam?). 
Scoring 20 hits (including Scorching Field) within 1.5 seconds of each applies x10+10 Scorch.
Kills refill 75 Ammo.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +20 Stability, +20 Handling, and the Incandescent trait.

weapons.name: Quicksilver Storm
weapons.description:
Damage Numbers are for Strand Versions.
Scoring 13 hits loads up a Tracking Missile, which will overwrite a regular bullet when firing. Hit Counter persists through stow, and is removed on reload. 
Tracking Missile aggressively tracks enemies, dealing 5 [2.7] Impact Damage, and up to 143 [20 Guardians | 80 Constructs] Explosive damage on impact. 
Tracking Missile Hits grant a stack of Grenades Prepped for Grenade Launcher Mode, up to 3 Grenades Prepped.
Grenade Prepped stacks and hit counter persist through stow. Missile cannot travel further than 50 metres.
Grenade Launcher Mode:
Hold [Reload] to swap into Grenade Launcher Mode once a Grenade Prepped stack is gained. Firing Mode persist through stow.
Firing consumes a Grenade Prepped stack to shoot a Grenade.
Grenades deal 25 [14 Guardians | 81 Constructs] Impact Damage, and up to 1,176 [120 Guardians | 960 Constructs] Explosive Damage in a 4 metre radius. 
Grenade deals no self-damage. Automatically queues up a reload to load the next grenade after firing. If out of grenades, it will instead perform a regular reload.
↑Nano-entanglement:
Converts the Damage Type to Strand. No longer receives Kinetic Damage Bonus.
Grenade Launcher Mode Kills create a Tangle.

weapons.name: Rat King
weapons.description:
Upon finishing a reload within 3 seconds of a kill:
Grants Invisibility for 5.8 seconds.
Grants a stack of Rat Pack per ally with a readied Rat King within 20 metres, up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
Rat Pack decreases Fire Recovery Delay and increases Magazine Size.
Rat Pack:
- | 0.87x | 0.8x | 0.7x | 0.6x Fire Recovery Delay
- | +2 | +4 | +6 | +9 Magazine Size
↑Infestation:
Passively grants +20 Aim Assist and +20 Recoil Direction.
Finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a kill begins Health Regeneration and restores ~2 HP.

weapons.name: Red Death Reformed
weapons.description:
Uses Auto Rifle Recoil Animations.
Scoring a Weapon Kill applies Cure x2 and grants +100 Reload Speed, and 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier for ? seconds. 
Finishing a reload within ? seconds of a kill grants Cure x? to allies within ? metres.
Scoring hits grants increased Handling, Flinch Resist, and Movement Speed for 3 seconds. Stacks up to 6? times.
x1 = +? Handling | ?% Flinch Resist | ?% Increased Movement Speed 
x2 = +? | ?% | +?% | x3 = +? | ?% | +?% | x4 = +? | ?% | +?% | x5 = +? | ?% | +?% | x6 = +? | ?% | +?%
Deals increasingly higher damage as Shield HP is decreased.
10% [2%] while Shield HP is <114 | 20% [4%] while Shield HP is <60 | 40% [6%] while Shield HP is 0.
↑Helping Hand:
Scoring 2 [1?] Weapon Kills grants Red Death Charged.
Kill counter, and Red Death Charged buff both persist through stow.
Upon scoring a Weapon Kill while Red Death Charged is active:
Triggers a healing burst and spawns a Restoration Orb on top of the user.
Healing Burst applies Cure x2 to allies within 7.5? meters. Restoration Orb grants Restoration x2 for 4+2 seconds.
User does not benefit from the Healing Burst as Cure has a cooldown, but will receive Restoration.
It's practically the same as a Touch of Flame Healing Grenade spawning on top of the user.

weapons.name: Revision Zero
weapons.description:
Selectable Origin Traits, between Heavy Burst Frames and Aggressive Burst Frames. 
Intrinsic Shield-Piercing Breaker.
Scoring 12 Precision Hits grants a stack of Targeting Data, up to 4 stacks after 48 Precision Hits.
Hunter's Trace:
Hold [Reload] while at least one stack of Targeting Data is loaded to swap into Hunter's Trace. Ammo loaded is equal to the amount of Targeting Data stacks acquired.
Replaces the 18 Zoom Scope with a 50 Zoom Scope. Fires with perfect accuracy, and has a Red Sniper Rifle Glint.
Fires High-Damage Hunter's Trace Rounds that deal 557.2 [158] Damage with a 3x Precision Multiplier at 72RPM and inherit the Shield-Piercing effect.
Scoring a Hunter's Trace hit triggers a Kinetic Shockwave that deals 280 [20] Damage and exhausts.
Hunter's Trace persists through stow and can only be deactivated by fully emptying the magazine or dying.
↑Selectable Retrofit:
Grants the option to slot-in Feeding Frenzy, Fourth Time's The Charm, Outlaw, or Under Pressure trait equivalents. Fourth Time's The Charm allows firing up to 6 Sniper Shots.

weapons.name: Ruinous Effigy
weapons.description:
Intrinsically has a 1.4x PVE Bonus over Legendary Trace Rifles.
Kills collapse enemies into Transmutation Spheres with 30 Ammo. Spheres can remain on the ground for up to 30 seconds. 
Transmutation Spheres are pickupable objects that are able to use Light Attacks, Heavy Attacks, and Guard/Drain. Dropping a Transmutation Sphere immediately despawns it.
Ammo is passively drained at a rate of 1 Ammo Per Second. Attacking or Guarding disables passive drain until the Attack Animation is finished or until no longer Guarding.
Transmutation Spheres:
They are considered Generic Void Weapons, and their damage can be increased through Weapon Damage Buffs, as well as Activity Surges and other generic Void Damage buffs. 
They are also able to inflict Volatile through Volatile Rounds, but will not inherit their Shield-Piercing Breaker capabilities. 
Spheres will not trigger, nor be affected by any effect related to Melee Abilities, Void Abilities, Trace Rifles, or Weapon Surge Mods.
Light Attacks | Lunges forward, dealing 300 [150] damage, disorienting Combatants and consuming 1 Ammo. Airborne Attacks deal 25% decreased damage. Can attack twice every second.
Heavy Attacks | Slams the Sphere onto the ground, detonating it, dealing 1500 [300 Guardians | 1500 Constructs] damage without falloff and inflicting suppression to enemies within 5? metres. 
Damage is unaffected by the Ammo Remaining.
Guarding | Projects a draining field over a ? metre radius, dealing 30 [12] damage and restoring 5 HP per enemy hit every 0.3 seconds.
Grants 80% [50%] Damage Resist and prevents knockback while guarding. Combatants inside the draining field are disoriented.
Ammo Drains at a rate of 1 Ammo every 0.25 seconds. The last remaining 3 Ammo drain at a rate of 1 Ammo every 0.5 seconds until 1 Ammo is left.
Guarding while at 1 Ammo inflicts Transfiguration, dealing increasingly higher self-damage every 0.7 seconds until no longer Guarding or death. 
Self-Damage inflicted maxes out at 100 damage per tick and ignores all Damage Resist. Will eventually outright kill after enough time.
↑Deconstruction:
Upon scoring a Transmutation Sphere Kill or upon damaging a Miniboss+ with a Transmutation Sphere:
30% [15%] increased damage for 7 seconds.

weapons.name: Slayer's Fang
weapons.typeString: Craftable Void Pinpoint Slug Frame Shotgun
weapons.description:
Reloads its entire magazine at once.
Intrinsic Overload Breaker.
Fires Slug Rounds that release 7 bouncing, tracking submunitions on impact.
Submunitions deal 88 [5.03] Void Damage, bounce up to 3 times, and are unaffected by damage falloff.
Submunitions deal 18% decreased damage on the first bounce, and 42.5% decreased damage on every bounce afterwards.
Directly impacting an enemy will score a hit with every submunition
Submunitions can be redirected towards the nearest enemy within 5? meters inside a 45? degree cone pointed in the direction of the the bounce.
 If the submunitions impact a surface, the redirection angle is increased to 360 degrees to enemies within 5 meters.
Scoring a kill or picking up a Void Breach grants Nightsworn Sight for 7 seconds and Truesight for 3 seconds.
Buff persists through stow. Allies with Slayer's Fang within ? meters also receive the buff upon scoring a kill.
While Nightsworn Sight is active:
Grants +? Reload Speed and 15% increased Precision Damage.
Submunitions inflict Weaken, and bounce up to 4 times. Possibly higher redirection angle.
Deals 10% increased damage towards Fallen and Scorn Combatants.
↑Catalyst:
Grants the option to slot-in Repulsor Brace, Stats for All, Cascade Point, and Loose Change trait equivalents.

weapons.name: Still Hunt
weapons.description:
Hold [Reload] to cast Golden Gun once it is fully charged, generating 3 Ammo, or 1 if Celestial Nighthawk is equipped.
Scoring Precision Hits and picking up Orbs of Power charge up Golden Gun Mode. 
Precision Hits = 16.7% | Orbs of Power = 8.34%
Super Charge can be obtained while stowed, and persists through both stow and death. Rally Flags fully charge up Golden Gun Mode.
Sharpshooter passively grants +? Aim Assist, 0.?x ADS Duration Multiplier, and ?% Flinch Resist.
Golden Gun Mode:
Has 3 Ammo and a hipfire reticle. Lasts for 16? seconds, and persists when stowed. 
Increases the Sharpshooter bonuses to +? Aim Assist, 0.?x ADS Duration Multiplier, ?% Flinch Resist, 18% Increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance and -60%? Accuracy Cone Size.
Deals 634 [238] damage with a 2x Precision Multiplier against Bosses.
Successive Precision Hits grant increased damage.
45% Increased Damage for the 2nd shot and 90% increased Damage for the 3rd shot.
Deals 5,543 damage over 3 Precision Hits againt Bosses.
Becoming suppressed deactivates Golden Gun Mode. Golden Gun Mode is NOT a Super Ability for any purposes.
Celestial Nighthawk alters Golden Gun Mode.
Decreases Ammo to 1.
Deals ??? [1061] Precision Damage against Bosses.
Celestial Nighthawk grants 2.4% increased damage over the base version, assuming 3 precision hits.

weapons.name: Sturm
weapons.description:
Kills refill Energy Weapons Magazine and +1 Increased Together Forever Magazine Capacity, up to a maximum of 100% Increased Magazine Capacity.
Kills with Together Forever Weapons load an Overcharged Round.
Scoring multiple kills within 3 seconds of each loads additional rounds, up to a maximum of 25 loaded rounds.
2 Rapid Kills = +2 Overcharged Rounds per kill | 3+ Rapid Kills and onwards = +3 Overcharged Rounds per kill.
Firing consumes an Overcharged Round to deal increased damage.
300% increased damage = Rank-and-File and Elites | 280% = Mini-bosses and Champions
260% increased damage = Bosses | 75% = Guardians
Overcharged Rounds persist through stow and are lost on death.
↑Helping Hands: Passively grants +20 Range and +40 Handling.
Overcharged Round Kills grants 2 stacks of Definitely-Not-Shot Swap, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Consumes a stack of Helping Hands, granting 0.5x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier.

weapons.name: Sunshot
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Explosive Payload.
Fires an explosive bullet that deals 66 [24] Impact Damage and 86 [24] Explosive Damage with a 2.69x Precision Multiplier.
Scoring a direct hit on enemies causes them to be visually highlight for 1 second.
Kills cause the target to explode, dealing up to 409 [160] damage and inflicting x10+5 Scorch over a ? metre radius.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +30 Range and +20 Stability.

weapons.name: SUROS Regime
weapons.description:
Selectable Trait between Dual Speed Receiver and Spinning Up. 
Hold [Reload] to swap shooting modes.
Kills have a 25% chance to begin Health Regeneration and restore 20HP.
Dual Speed Receiver turns the weapon into a High-Impact Auto Rifle Frame with +3 Zoom and +30 Range while ADS.
Scoring kills while Dual Speed Receiver ADS is active grants 1.?x Heavy Ammo Progress Multiplier.
Spinning Up grants 0.83x to 0.67x Fire Recovery Delay while holding down the trigger. 
RPM increases every 12 bullets while holding down the trigger. Releasing the trigger resets the buff.
Scoring kills while Spinning Up is active grants 1.?x Special Ammo Progress Multiplier.
As magazine progressively decreases below 50%, down to 0%:
5% to 10% increased damage.
↑SUROS Ascendance:
Passively grants +50 Recoil Direction.
Kills have a 50% chance to restore health.

weapons.name: Sweet Business
weapons.description:
Rapidly shoots bullets that deal 37 [16.45] damage with a 1.54x Precision Multiplier.
On Special or Power Ammo Pickup: 
Refills magazine.
While holding down the trigger:
Spins up the weapon, gradually granting up to 0.4x Fire Recovery Delay and +? Range over 1.38 seconds.
Grants -15% Hipfire Accuracy Cone Size while fully spun up.
Fires an explosive round every 18 shots, dealing up to 51 [21] damage. 
Explosive Shot requirement is lowered to 8 while fully spun up.
Explosive does not suffer Damage Falloff. 
↑Serious Business:
Grants 25% Flinch Resistance while fully spun up.

weapons.name: The Chaperone
weapons.description:
Grants Lightweight Frame bonuses. Passively has 5% Increased Damage Falloff Distance.
Upon scoring a Precision Kill, or 2 Precision Hits within ? seconds of each:
Grants Roadborn for 10 seconds.
Roadborn:
22% Increased Precision Damage, +20 Stability, +40 Reload Speed, 0.75x Reload Duration Multiplier, 0.56x Handling Duration Multiplier, and 0.58x Fire Recovery Delay.
10% Increased Damage Falloff Distance. Additive to Passive.
Scoring additional Precision Hits extends the buff duration by +3 seconds, up to 10? seconds.

weapons.name: The Jade Rabbit
weapons.description:
Upon scoring 3 Precision Hits within 2 seconds of each:
Refills 3 Ammo and grants 1 stack of Fate of All Fools, up to a maximum of 3 stacks.
Fate of All Fools persists through stow and is removed upon reloading.
Fate of All Fools:
Non-Precision Hits deal the same damage as a Precision Hit and consume a stack.
↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +30 Stability.

weapons.name: The Last Word
weapons.description:

+5 | +10 | +15 | +20 Reload Speed
 -5% | -10% | -15% | -20% Accuracy Cone Size

weapons.description:
Upon scoring 8 hits within 1 second of each on an ally:
Ally restores 60HP, begins Health Regeneration, and is granted Woven Mail. Wielder is granted Woven Mail and generates 5 Ammo.
If Shields are healed, then Shields will recharge, otherwise only up to Critical Health.
Upon scoring 20 hits within 1 second of each:
Inflicts sever, and grants the wielder Woven Mail.
While Woven Mail is active:
Grants 25% [5%] increased damage and +40 Ammo Generation.
↑Gordian Knot. Hold [Reload] to swap into Grapple Tangle Firing Mode. 
Grapple Tangle Mode shoots a Grapple Tangle up to 23.5 meters away at the cost of 1 Ammo.
Shows a preview of the Grapple Tangle impact spot while Alternate Fire Mode is active.
Incurs a 30 second cooldown before Alt Fire can be activated upon creating a Grapple Tangle. Must land on the ground for the timer to begin. Stowing swaps back to Trace Rifle Mode.

weapons.name: Thorn
weapons.description:
Counts as a Weapon of Sorrow.
Direct hits poison, dealing 26 [0.4] Kinetic Damage after a 0.3 seconds delay, every 0.5 seconds 4 times, dealing up to 112 [1.6] Kinetic Damage over 2 seconds.
Kills create a floating Remnant that home in towards the user while within 10? metres.
Remnants refill 4 Ammo, overflowing up to 40 Ammo, and grant Soul Devourer for an initial duration of 7 seconds on pickup.
Soul Devourer increases Poison damage by 200% [1750?%]. 
Picking up additional Remnants extend the duration of Soul Devourer by +7 seconds, up to 11 seconds.
Soul Devourer persists through stow.
↑Refined Soul:
Passively grants +15 Range, +5 Stability, and +5 Airborne Effectiveness.
Scoring a kill or picking up a Remnant grant Refined Soul for 7 seconds.
Refined Soul grants additional +10? Range, +15? Handling, and +50 Mobility.
Picking up additional Remnants, or scoring additional kills extend the duration of Refined Soul by +7 seconds, up to 11 seconds.
Refined Soul remains active while stowed.

weapons.name: Touch of Malice
weapons.description:
Hold [Reload] to trigger Blight Launcher once charged. Counts as a Weapon of Sorrow.
Scoring 10 Precision Hits charges Blight Launcher Mode.
Upon reaching 100% Counter Progress through Weapon Kills within 5 seconds of each:
 Rank-And-File = 33.4% | Elites/Minibosses/Bosses = 100% | Guardians = 66.7%.
Begins Health Regeneration and restores 105 HP.
While Magazine = 1:
Deals 140% [30%] increased damage, drains 7 HP per shot, and is automatically refilled. Health Drain is not lethal.
Blight Launcher's Damage benefits from the Final Round's Damage Increase. Health Drain is affected by Damage Resist.
Blight Launcher:
Shoots a slow moving Blight that deals 208 [113] Arc Damage on direct impact, and has a damaging field that deals 1 damage, blinds and poisons enemies.
Poison deals 25 [0.375?] Kinetic Damage every 0.5 seconds for 3.5 [2] seconds a total of 7 [4] times.
Enemies hit by the Blight receive 50% increased damage taken from Weapons of Sorrow for 5 seconds.
Triggering the Blight Launcher begins Health Regeneration and restores 105 HP.
↑Touch of Mercy:
Grants the Rapid Hit trait.

weapons.name: Traveler's Chosen
weapons.description:
Kills grants a stack of Gathering Light, up to a maximum of 10 stacks.
Gathering Light grants +15 Handling, +15 Reload Speed, and +2 Aim Assist per stack.
Gathering Light stacks persist through stow.

↑Catalyst:
Passively grants +2 Magazine Size (15 -> 17), the Osmosis trait, and the Surplus trait.

weapons.name: Verglas Curve
weapons.description:
Grants Lightweight Frame bonuses.

Hail Barrage Arrows create a Large Stasis Crystal on impact, and inflict x100 [x60 for 1+1 seconds] Slow on direct hit.
Deals 50% increased damage against Frozen Enemies and Stasis Crystals. Stacks multiplicatively with Whisper of Rending and Frozen Enemy Multipliers.
↑Shiver Quiver:
Grants 0.65x Draw Time Multiplier for 5 seconds upon inflicting freeze or slow.

weapons.name: Vigilance Wing
weapons.description:
Shoots a burst of 5 bullets, each dealing 38 [16] damage with a 1.62x Precision Multiplier.

+20 Mobility, 33% Increased Slide Distance, and 6.25% Increased Sprint Speed for 6 seconds.
Begins Health Regeneration.
While Last Guardian Standing or Solo: 
+100 Health Stat, +X Handling, and +30? Reload Speed.
↑Catalyst:
Grants the Ensemble trait.

weapons.name: Wicked Implement
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Overload Breaker. 
Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 4.5 seconds of each grants Creeping Attrition for 4.5 seconds. 
Additional Precision Hits refresh the duration of Creeping Attrition.

Precision Hits inflict x40 [x20] Slow for 4+4 [4+2] seconds. 
Scoring a Precision Kill or shattering a Stasis Crystal creates a Small Stasis Shard that returns to the wielder.
 Incurs a 2 second cooldown between spawning shards.
Collecting Stasis Shards or destroying Stasis Crystals refills Magazine.
↑Hadopelagic Tribute: 
Stasis Shards additionally grant +5 Ammo on pickup, overflowing up to 100% Increased Magazine Capacity, and the Headstone trait.

weapons.name: Wish-Ender
weapons.description:
Intrinsic Shield-Piercing Breaker.
[ADS] while fully-drawn grants Truesight, displaying enemy silhouettes through walls up to 64 metres away.

Draw Strength affects the damage of all damage instances.
25% Increased damage against Combatants stuck by Witherhoard's Blight. 
10% Increased damage against Taken Combatants.

Upon suspending an enemy, or upon damaging a Suspended enemy with this weapon:
+100 Reload Speed and 0.7x Draw Time Multiplier for ? seconds.
↑Catalyst grants multiple craftable traits:
Enduring Snare Refit increases Snareweaver Trap duration by +10 seconds, to 25 seconds.
Multi-threaded Snare Refit increases the maximum amount of suspensions per trap to 3, totalling a maximum of 18 suspensions. 
Hatchling trait.
Vorpal Weapon trait.

On Super Cast, for the Caster and Allies within ? meters.

Rally are placed close together, while Towering are placed spread out.

(Finishers) increase the duration of the Void Invisibility by +3 seconds.
Invisibility Duration 
Minor = 7 seconds (10)

+100 Handling for 2 seconds. Stowing cancels the effect.

armors.description:

Weighted Throwing Knives gain a second bounce with greatly increased tracking.

 Grants Strengthened Throwing Knife for 10 seconds.

300% [100%] increased Weighted Throwing Knife damage and +50 Melee Stat while active.

 Buff is consumed on hit.

armors.name: Balance of Power
armors.description:
Enhances Threaded Specter
 Specter has 50% [25%] Damage Resist, 67% increased Duration, and 2 Perched Threadlings.

Allies within 30? meters receive x4 Stasis Weapon Surge for 15 [6] seconds and maximum Frost Armor stacks.

 Buff is refreshable. Refund only works once per ally?.

User and Allies within ? meters receive x2 Stasis Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds and maximum Frost Armor.

Grants maximum Frost Armor stacks to the user.

armors.name: Beyond The Veil
armors.description: Embers of Light

armors.name: Blastwave Striders

75% Damage Resist against Explosive Self-Damage.

RnF = 7.5% | Elite+ = 15% | Guardians = 20%
Alethonym's Vestiges = 10%

armors.name: Blight Ranger
armors.description:
While in Arc Staff Super:
Blocking doesn't consume any extra Super Energy.

armors.name: Briarbinds

Grants increased Void Soul damage and Damage Resist.

Void Soul Benefits:
25% | 50% | 75% | 100% increased damage.
12.5% | 25% | 37.5% | 50% Damage Resist.

Upon scoring 3 Precision Hits within ? seconds of each, or a Kill:

Proximity Explosive Knife inflicts x60+0 Scorch on detonation.

On Golden Gun Kill:
Refunds 33% Super Energy 
Enemy explodes, dealing up to 400 [?] Damage to enemies within ? metres.
On Precision Kill:

 Actual amount varies by Enemy Rank.

armors.name: Cenotaph Mask

Void: Weaken for 4 seconds.
Stasis: x30 Slow for 7+1 seconds.
Strand: Sever for 6+2 seconds.

armors.name: Citan's Ramparts

armors.name: Claws of Ahamkara

Grants 20% Damage Resist.

Scatter: 3700% [2700%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate.
Vortex: 3400% [2400%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate.
HHSN: 3000% [2000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate.

Instantly restores Health and Shields to the wielder and allies in Line of Sight within 12 metres.

Scoring direct hits within 3 seconds of each while behind a Barricade progresses a Counter System that triggers an additional healing pulse that restores 30 HP over 12 meters upon reaching 100%.
SMG, Trace = 7.14% || Auto, MG = 8.33% || Pulse = 9.1% || Sidearm = 12.5% || HC, Scout = 16.7%
Sword = 20% | Bow, Glaive, GL, Shotgun, Snipers = 34%

Incurs a 5 second cooldown upon triggering a healing pulse before other pulses will restore health again.

 Grants a stack of Conduction Tines for 7 [4] seconds, up to a maximum of 3 stacks.
