armors.name: Cuirass of the Falling Star
armors.description:
Thundercrash deals 55% increased damage.
On Thundercrash Deactivation:
50% [10%] Damage Resist (Resist x4) for 5 seconds.
On Melee Kill, while Amplified:
Grants additional Super Energy based on the Enemy Tier.
Tier 1 Combatant = 2.5?% | T2 = 2.5% | T3 = ?% | T4 = 3% | Guardian = ?%
Works with any Super Ability.

armors.name: Cyrtarachne's Facade
armors.description:
Upon Grappling:
Grants Woven Mail for 10 seconds.
Restores 7 HP.
While Woven Mail is active:
?% Flinch Resistance.
Kills restore 17 HP.

armors.name: Dawn Chorus
armors.description:
Daybreak Projectiles inflict an additional x75+? Scorch on hit.
79% increased Daybreak Super Damage. Includes Phoenix Dive and Daybreak Projectiles.
Scorch deals 200% [50%] increased damage and grants 5% Melee Ability Energy per tick.
Does not affect Ignition damage. 
Daybreak Projectile's Extra Scorch does not receive increased damage!

armors.name: Deimosuffusion
armors.description:
While a Strand Super Ability is equipped:
Casting a Rift suspends combatants within 6 meters.
Suspension inflicted by the user is enhanced.
Killing Suspended Enemies restores 15 Health.
Malevolent Grasp:
Suspended Enemies are dealt increasingly higher Strand Damage every 0.467 seconds.
Restores 5 HP every time a Suspended Enemy takes damage from Enhanced Suspension DoT.
Damage begins at 23 [9], increasing by ~5.5% [?%] per tick on average. Longer Suspend = Bigger Damage
Suspended Enemies are dealt 64 [34?] Damage once Suspension expires.
Deals a total of ~380 Strand Damage on an Elite Combatant. Thread of Continuity increases it to ~550.
Malevolent Grasp inflicted through Rift Cast deals 112.5% increased damage. Numbers above do NOT include this.

armors.name: Doom Fang Pauldron
armors.description:
Scoring 2–3 Void Kills within 10 seconds of each grants a stack of Void Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds, up to a maximum of x4 Void Weapon Surge.
Additional Void Kills while at x4 Weapon Surge refresh the buff duration.
On Powered Void Melee Kill:
Grants 20% [10%] Super Energy. Can only trigger once per Melee Activation.
Grants x4 Void Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds.
Sentinel Shield's Shield Throw Hits grant 10% Super Energy, extending Super Duration.
Sentinel Shield Light Attack Kills grant 100% Shield Throw Energy.

armors.name: Double Down
armors.description: Hearts of Ice

armors.name: Dunemarchers
armors.description:
Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
Increases Slide Distance by 33%
After sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
Grants Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.
On Direct Melee Hit while Linear Actuations is active:
Consumes Linear Actuations to inflict Shocked for 2 seconds.
Shocked Enemies release a Static Charge to non-Shocked Enemies within 12 meters.
Static Charge deals 220 [50] damage and inflicts Shocked.
Shocked refreshes when spreading to other enemies up to 6 times per Linear Actuations trigger.
Grants x2 Bolt Charge per Shocked inflicted.
Guardians are immune to additional chain damage for 2 seconds while Shocked.

armors.name: Eternal Warrior
armors.description:
Scoring 2–3 Arc Kills within 10 seconds of each grants a stack of Arc Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds, up to a maximum of x4 Arc Weapon Surge.
Additional Arc Kills while at x4 Weapon Surge refresh the buff duration.
On Fists of Havoc Cast: 
Grants a 75 HP Overshield that negates Precision Damage.
Regenerates over 7 second after 5 seconds of not receiving damage if Overshield is active.
Fists of Havoc Kills grant ?% Super Ability Energy.
On Fists of Havoc End:
Grants x4 Arc Weapon Surge for 30 [6] seconds.

armors.name: Eunoia
armors.description:
Hellion Projectiles deal 20% increased damage after travelling 17 meters.
Hellion Projectiles that have been in the air for 1 second release 4 pieces of Shrapnel.
Shrapnel deals 18 [?] Solar Damage and inflicts x5+0 Scorch.
Shrapnel projectiles have tracking.

armors.name: Eye of Another World
armors.description:
Passively grants 50% Additional Base Grenade, Melee, and Class Regeneration Rate, and +15 Airborne Effectiveness.
Highlights enemies below 50% HP enemies in a red outline.
Highlights Enemy Guardians with Fully-charged Supers in a yellow outline.
Invisible enemies that are below 50% HP or have a fully-charged Super will also be highlighted.

armors.name: Fallen Sunstar
armors.description:
Ionic Traces move 66% faster and grant doubled Ability Energy.
Total Ability Energy Gained per Ionic Trace:
Grenade: 25% | Melee: 25% | Class Ability: 30%
On Ionic Trace Pickup:
Allies within 15 metres receive 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.

armors.name: Felwinter's Helm
armors.description:
Powered Melee Damage inflicts regular weaken for 6 seconds.
 Does not work with Grapple Melee nor Song of Flame.
On Powered Melee Kill or Finisher:
Enemy triggers a Highly Weakening Burst centered on the Enemy Death Location, disorienting and increasing damage by 30% for a variable duration.
Weakening Burst Duration and Range are dependent on Enemy Rank (Finisher).
Screen becomes blackened for 7.5 seconds, progressively getting clearer as the debuff reaches its 15 second duration. HUD does not disappear.
Warlord's End.
Rank-and-File: Debuffs in a 15 (20) meter radius for 10 (15) seconds.
Elite: Debuffs in a 20 (25) meter radius for 15 (20) seconds.
Miniboss+: Debuffs in a 25 (25) meter radius for 20 (20) seconds.

armors.name: Foetracer
armors.description:
Upon dealing Ability Damage to an Elite, Miniboss, Champion, Boss, or Guardian: 
Grants x4 Ability Element-Matching Weapon Surge and highlights the enemy for 16 [11] seconds.
Buff is not refreshable.
Killing highlighted enemies spawns a Subclass-Matching Elemental Pickup.

armors.name: Fortune’s Favor
armors.description:
While at Full Health | Upon scoring a kill, or upon being out of combat for 4.5 [15] seconds:
Grants 6.6 [1.1] Void Overshield HP per second until re-entering combat.
Continuously refreshes Overshield duration.
While an Overshield is active:
+35? Stability, +35? Handling, and -5% Accuracy Cone Size.
Weapons receive 15% increased damage against Combatants.
Heat Weapons are instead granted 20% increased damage against Combatants. 
Scoring a kill while an Overshield is active prepares Hasty Escape.
Hasty Escape grants +30? Mobility for 5 seconds when Overshield is depleted.

armors.name: Fr0st-EE5
armors.description:
While Sprinting: 
2x Grenade and Melee Regeneration Speed | 100% Additional Base Grenade/Melee Regeneration Rate
100% [200%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.
On Class Ability Usage:
6.25% Faster Sprint Speed for 10 seconds. 
Not refreshable.

armors.name: Gemini Jester
armors.description:
On Class Ability Usage:
Inflicts Misdirection to enemies within 22 metres.
 Misdirection:
Rank-and-File and Elite Combatants become disoriented for 5 seconds.
 Audio becomes briefly distorted, briefly applies disorient, and radar is removed for 5 seconds.
Misdirection deals 1 damage against enemies not at 1HP.

armors.name: Geomag Stabilizers
armors.description:
After sprinting for 1.5 seconds and maintaining the sprint, while having at least x5 Bolt Charge:
Grants a stack of Bolt Charge every 0.33 seconds.
On Ionic Trace Pickup:
Grants 4% Chaos Reach Super Ability Energy.
Chaos Reach grants 10% Super Ability Energy on hit.
Incurs a 0.75 seconds cooldown between activation. 
 Chaos Reach's Total Damage is increased by up to 120%

armors.name: Getaway Artist
armors.description:
While an Arc Grenade Ability is equipped:
Holding [Grenade] summons a Sentient Arc Soul for 20 seconds and grants Amplified.
Sentient Arc Soul grants 5% Grenade Energy once per burst if it damages an enemy.
Does not grant Grenade Energy on hit while Devour is active.

armors.name: Gifted Conviction
armors.description:
Upon using Ascension or Tempest Strike:
Releases 3 tracking Arc projectiles forward.
Arc Projectiles deal up to 200 [40] damage and inflict jolt.
Upon inflicting Jolt to enemies within 15? meters:
Grants a stack of Resist for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 4 stacks.
Additional Jolt Applications to enemies within 15? meters refreshes the buff duration.
Damage Resist Scaling:
1 Jolt Applications = 25% [5%] Damage Resist (Resist x2)
2 Jolt Applications = 40% [7.5%] Damage Resist (Resist x3)
3 Jolt Applications = 50% [10%] Damage Resist (Resist x4)

armors.name: Graviton Forfeit
armors.description:
Void Invisibility effects last 2 seconds longer.
Upon gaining Void Invisibility:
Grants Vanishing Shadow for 7 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 stacks.
Vanishing Shadow duration does not decrease while Invisible.
x1 = 166.6% Additional Base Grenade and Melee, and 67% Class Ability Regeneration Rate
x2 = 333.3% Additional Base Grenade and Melee, and 134% Class Ability Regeneration Rate
x3 = 500% Additional Base Grenade and Melee, and 200% Class Ability Regeneration Rate
Upon reaching x3 Vanishing Shadow or gaining Void Invisibility while at x3 ??:
Grants 15 Void Overshield HP for 7+3? seconds.

armors.name: Gwisin Vest
armors.description:
Upon Void Invisibility ending, while within 15 meters of an enemy:
Triggers a Snare Bomb on the user.
Incurs a 5 second cooldown between activations.
Does not interact with Trapper's Ambush.
While in Spectral Blades:
Restores Super Energy on Heavy Attack based on the amount of Spectral Blade Kills and Hits.
Super Energy % Extension gains based on hits and kills
?%
?%

armors.name: Gyrfalcon's Hauberk
armors.description:
Upon Void Invisibility ending:
Grants Volatile Rounds for 9 [3] seconds.
Upon performing a Finisher while affected by Void Invisibility:
Grants 35% increased damage for 6 seconds.
Grants the user and allies within 24 metres a Reserve Overshield 
Reserve Overshield:
Grants 500% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate until Class Ability Usage.
Activated on Class Ability Usage, granting a 40 HP Void Overshield for 10 seconds.

armors.name: Hallowfire Heart
armors.description:
Passively grants +20 Airborne Effectiveness.
While standing in a Sunspot:
Solar Kills create a Sunspot.
While a Solar Super Ability is equipped and charged:
350% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate.

armors.name: Hawkeye Hack
armors.description: Crystalline Transistor

armors.name: Hazardous Propulsion
armors.description:
Scoring a Precision Kill, 4 Weapon Kills, or filling up a counter through Precision Hits, grants a stack of Exodus Rocket, up to a maximum 6 Exodus Rocket stacks. 
Precision Hit Counter:
Trace Rifles: 10%
Auto Rifle and Machine Gun: 15%
Pulse Rifles, Sidearms, and Crimson: 20%
Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, and Shotguns: 40%
Bows, Linear Fusion Rifles, Rocket Sidearms, and Sniper Rifles: 67%
Precision Counter doesn't reset upon loading a rocket, leading to alternating shots in some cases.  (3 -> 2 -> 3 HC shots, for example)
On Class Ability Usage:
Consumes all stacks, firing a homing Kinetic Rocket per stack, each dealing up to 600 [28] Kinetic Damage over ? meters and granting a stack of Exodus Rocket for 10 seconds per hit scored.
Exodus Rocket grant increased Rocket and Micromissile Weapon Damage, up to 35% at x6 stacks.
x1 = 10% | x2 = 17% | x3 = 24% | x4 = 30% | x5 = 33% | x6 = 35%

armors.name: Heart of Inmost Light
armors.description:
On Grenade or Class Ability Usage, or upon dealing Powered Melee Damage:
Grants a stack of Empowered Abilities for the other two abilities for 5 seconds, up to 2 stacks. 
e.g.: Dealing Thunderclap damage -> Increased Grenade and Class Ability Regeneration.
x1 = 400% [100%] | x2 = 800% [200%] Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate. 
x1 = 25% | x2 = 50% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.
x1 = 20% [10%] | x2 = 35% [20%] Increased Grenade Damage.
x1 = 10% | x2 = 50% Increased Melee Damage.
Buff display is NOT accurate to the active ability regen. 
With the example in mind, Class Ability Usage before Empowered x1 from Melee runs out will do the following:
Grenade Empower will go to x2 and will have its duration refreshed. Melee will receive Empower x1 for 5 seconds, and Class Empower x1 won't be refreshed, despite the UI saying Empowered x2.

armors.name: Helm of Saint-14
armors.description:
Guarding with Sentinel Shield blinds enemies within 7 [3.5] metres for 5 seconds.
Enemies that enter the Ward of Dawn are blinded for 5 seconds.
Ward of Dawn grants Starless Night and Weapons of Light.
Starless Night grants the user and allies that leave the Ward of Dawn receive Void Overshield.
Weapons of Light grants the user and allies 25% increased damage for ? seconds.
Weapons of Light's duration is constantly refreshed while inside the Ward of Dawn.

armors.name: Hoarfrost-Z
armors.description:
While a Stasis Super Ability is equipped:
Class Abilities now spawn Stasis Crystals.
Rally and Towering Barricades are replaced by Glacial Fortification.
Glacial Fortification is composed of 4 medium crystals, and a small crystal in the middle.
Glacial Fortification Inherits Rally Barricade Bonuses, even if no crystals remain.
Overrides Barricade Cooldown with Towering Barricade's.
On Thruster Usage:
Spawns 2 Stasis Crystals in a V formation ahead of the user.
Does not receive Rally Barricade bonuses, nor does it override the cooldown.

armors.name: Hunters
armors.description: Warlocks

armors.name: Icefall Mantle
armors.description:
While a Stasis Super Ability is equipped:
Restores 10 HP per stack of Frost Armor gained.
Upon scoring 2 Stasis Kills within 3 seconds of each:
Grants a stack of Frost Armor. 
Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard. 
Overwrites Barricade Cooldown to pre-EoF versions, resulting in ~1.45x Class Ability Regeneration Speed.
Towering = 101s -> 70s.
On Glacial Guard Cast:
Grants maximum Frost Armor stacks to the user.
Restores 50 HP, or 80 HP while Whisper of Rime is equipped.
Inflicts x100 [x40] Slow to enemies within ? meters.

armors.name: Illegally Modded Holster
armors.description: Stylostixis

armors.name: Karnstein Armlets
armors.description:
On Melee Kill:
Grants x3 Cure and Restoration x1 for 8+4 seconds.
On Finisher:
Grants x3 Cure and Restoration x2 for 8+4 seconds.

armors.name: Khepri's Horn
armors.description:
Solar Kills grant 15% Class Ability Energy.
Incurs a 1? second cooldown between Solar Kills granting Class Ability Energy.
On Barricade Placement, while a Solar Super Ability is equipped:
Unleashes 3 Tracking Solar Wave up to 18.5 metres away.
Solar Waves:
Each deals 480 [100] damage and inflicts x60+30 [x30+15] Scorch. Damage cannot overlap.
Solar Waves spawn a Sunspot under the enemies on hit [kill].
Solar Wave do not benefit from, nor trigger Roaring Flames.
Solar Effects triggered by Khepri's Solar Waves lose their 3x PVE bonus.
This means Ignitions deal 66.7% decreased damage.
Also, due to some wonkiness regarding Sunspot scorch, it takes ~5.3 seconds to ignite without Ashes, and ~1 second with Ashes.

armors.name: Khepri's Sting
armors.description:
Upon killing a Weakened Enemy:
Releases a weakening cloud of smoke on Enemy Death Location.
Grants 27% Smoke Bomb Melee Energy.
Functionally, the cloud of smoke is a Snare Bomb that is instantly detonated.

armors.name: Kismet
armors.description: Rites of Ember

armors.name: Knucklehead Radar
armors.description:
Passively grants +20 Airborne Effectiveness and radar remains active while ADS.
While crouched: 
Grants Enhanced Radar.
 (Has 12 sectors instead of 6)
Upon dealing damage to a Combatant, or upon breaking a Guardian's Shield:
Marks enemies for 3 seconds.
Mark persists through walls.
If Enemy is below 30% Health: 
Grants 1% increased Weapon and Ability Damage per percent below 30%.
10% HP left -> 20% Increased Damage. Shields do not count as Health.

armors.name: Liar's Handshake
armors.description:
While an Arc Melee is equipped:
Receiving Melee Damage, or scoring a Powered Melee Hit grants Cross Counter for the next Melee Hit within 3 seconds.
Cross Counter grants 400% increased Melee Damage and restores 40 HP on Melee Hit.
Cross Counter's Melee deals Arc Damage.

armors.name: Light Shift
armors.description: Grasp of the Devourer

armors.name: Lion Rampant
armors.description:
Enables hipfiring and ADS while in Lift, and passively grants +50 Airborne Effectiveness.
Increases Lift Duration to 4 seconds.
Lift Duration in seconds:
High Lift: 2.6 -> 4 (54% increase)
Strafe Lift: 2.2 -> 4 (82% increase)
Catapult Lift: 1 -> 4 (300% increase)
For Primary Weapons while hipfiring:
+5 Range, +30 Stability,
-30% Accuracy Cone Size, +2?° Precision Angle Threshold,
20% Increased Aim Assist and Damage Falloff Distance.
 DMT, Last Word, and Tommy's Matchbook do not receive the Falloff bonuses, and receive uniquely tweaked Accuracy values.

armors.name: Loreley Splendor
armors.description:
While a Solar Super Ability is equipped:
While at Critical Health if the Class Ability is charged, or upon casting Barricade:
Spawns a Sunspot under the user. 
Consumes a Class Ability Charge if it's triggered by Critical Health.
The Sunspot spawned grants Sol Invictus even without the Aspect equipped. 
However, the Sunspot duration cannot be extended without it.

armors.name: Lucky Pants
armors.description:
While a Hand Cannon is readied:
+20 Airborne Effectiveness
Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% | Increases Slide Distance by 33%
Upon Readying a Hand Cannon:
Grants Illegally Modded Holster for 6 seconds.
Direct Hits against Combatants grant stacks of Illegally Modded Holster, up to a maximum of 10 stacks.
Illegally Modded Holster is removed upon readying a non-Hand Cannon.
Illegally Modded Holster:
+100 Ready Speed Handling, 0.6x Ready Duration Multiplier, and -30% Accuracy Cone Size.
45% increased Direct Impact damage against Combatants per stack, up to 450% at 10 stacks.
Eriana's Vow receives 30% increased Direct Impact Damage per stack.
Sturm's Overcharged Rounds, Malfeasance's Explosive Shadow, Hawkmoon's Paracausal Shot, as well as any non-direct damage is not increased.
After Illegally Modded Holster expires, or upon stowing, if Illegally Modded Holster stacks were at x7 or higher:
Applies Out of Luck for 10 seconds, preventing Illegally Modded Holster from being activated.

armors.name: Lucky Raspberry
armors.description:
Arcbolt Grenades are now able to chain an additional time, up to 5 times.
Arcbolt Grenades inflict Jolt and Disruption.
Upon inflicting Jolt:
Grants 15% Arcbolt Grenade Ability Energy. 
Upon triggering Jolt chain damage:
Grants 7.5% Arcbolt Grenade Ability Energy.

armors.name: Lunafaction Boots
armors.description:
For wearer and allies standing on Rifts and Well of Radiances cast by the wearer:
+100 Reload Speed and 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.
Empowering Rifts and Well of Radiances grant 100% [50%] Increased Damage Falloff Distance.
Effect persists even after swapping off of the Exotic.
For Primary Weapons while hipfiring:
+5 Range, +30 Stability,
-30% Accuracy Cone Size, +2?° Precision Angle Threshold,
20% Increased Aim Assist and Damage Falloff Distance.
 DMT, Last Word, and Tommy's Matchbook do not receive the Falloff bonuses, and receive uniquely tweaked Accuracy values.

armors.name: Mantle of Battle Harmony
armors.description:
Upon scoring a Super-Element Matching Weapon Kill:
Grants additional Super Energy based on the Enemy Tier.
Tier 1 Combatant = 1.5% | T2 = 2% | T3 = ?% | T4 = 2.5% | Guardian = 2.5?%
Upon scoring a Super-Element Matching Weapon Kill while Super Ability is charged:
Grants x4 Super-Element Matching Weapon Surge for 11 [6] seconds.

armors.name: Mask of Bakris
armors.description:
While an Arc or Stasis Super Ability is equipped:
Replaces Dodge with Shift.
Does not replace Acrobat's Dodge. Overrides Cooldown and Chunk Scalar to Marksman's Dodge.
On Class Ability Usage:
Performs a quick shift that moves the user up to 12 meters away, rendering them invisible and invulnerable for the duration of the shift.
Grants a stack of Light Shift for 11 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 stacks.
Light Shift:
10% | 21% | 33% increased Arc, Stasis, and Lord of Wolves Weapon Damage.
 10% Increased Weapon Damage against Stasis Debuffed Enemies.
Weapon Kills grant 60% Class Ability Energy while active. 57 stat needed for 50%.

armors.name: Mask of Fealty
armors.description:
On Withering Blade hits and bounces:
Spawns a Small Stasis Crystal on the 1st and 3rd bounce.
Grants 7.5% Fixed Melee Ability Energy.
Upon shattering a Stasis Crystal with a Withering Blade:
Releases 3 Stasis Projectiles spread out 120° near the Stasis Crystal.
Stasis Projectiles spawn a Small Crystal on impact.

armors.name: Mask of the Quiet One
armors.description:
Upon receiving damage from an enemy:
Grants 5% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.
Incurs a 1 second cooldown between activations.
While a Void Super Ability is equipped:
Upon scoring 3 kills within 5 seconds of each, or a kill while at Critical Health:
Grants Devour for 5+2.5 seconds.
It is definitely not old devour lmfao.

armors.name: Mataiodoxía
armors.description:
Arcane Needles become Shield-Piercing.
Scoring an Arcane Needle hit on an enemy marks them with a vertical mark for 10 seconds.
Grants Melee Ability Energy upon scoring an Arcane Needle Kill or Suspended Enemy kill.
T1 Combatant = 15% | T2 = 22.2% | T3 = 33% | T4 = 100% | Guardian = 33%
On Marked Enemy Death:
Deals 120 [40] Damage and inflicting Suspension to enemies within 10 meters.
Functionally a Suspending Blast, relevant for below.
Upon scoring 2 Arcane Needle hits on a Marked Enemy:
Triggers a Suspending Blast with 100% increased damage.
Upon scoring 5 Needlestorm Hits against a single enemy:
Triggers a Suspending Blast with 1000% increased damage.
Suspending Blast Damage = 80 RnF | 120 Elites | 160 Miniboss | 200 Boss | 40 Guardians
and it is Grenade Damage sooooooooooooooooooooooo

armors.name: Mechaneer's Tricksleeves
armors.description:
Passively grants +50 Airborne Effectiveness, +100 Handling and +100 Reload Speed to Sidearms.
Upon readying a sidearm while at Critical Health:
Grants Damage Buff and refills Sidearm ammo.
Damage Buff:
Grants 100% [10%] increased Sidearm damage.
Sidearm Kills refill Magazine.
Damage Buff has no timer while at Critical Health. 
Damage Buff has a 5 second timer upon Shields recovering.
Sidearm Kills refresh 3 seconds.

armors.name: Melas Panoplia
armors.description:
Upon collecting a Firesprite, or scoring ? Solar Kills within ? seconds of each:
Grants Forge Master for 12 seconds. Buff timer begins ticking once a Throwing Hammer is used.
Initially activating Forge Master grants 11.7% Melee Energy for 8 seconds.
While Forge Master is active:
Allows recalling the Throwing Hammer by pressing [Melee] and grants slight tracking to it.
Recalling after 2? seconds of scoring a Throwing Hammer hit performs a Perfect Recall.
Perfect Recall triggers an explosion that deals up to 290 [?] Damage over ~5 meters.
Performing Perfect Recalls and picking up additional Firesprites extends the buff duration by 3 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

armors.name: Misdirection
armors.description: Consul's Pitch

armors.name: Mk. 44 Stand Asides
armors.description:
While Juggernaut's Shield is active:
Grants a stack of Bolt Charge every ? seconds.
While Speed Booster is active:
Creates an area behind the user that grants allies Speed Booster.

armors.name: Moirai
armors.description:
Threaded Spike can now bounce to Tangles, detonating them and immediately returning.
Detonating a Tangle with Threaded Spike automatically collects a copy of it.
Catching a Threaded Spike that doesn't hit a Tangle refunds an additional 25% Melee Ability Energy, unaffected by Melee Stat.

armors.name: Mothkeeper’s Wraps
armors.description:
Replaces Grenade Ability with 2 Ability Charges of Cage of Loyal Moths.
Moth Cage overrides Grenade Cooldown to 73 seconds and Chunk Scalar to 1x.
Moth Cage:
Explodes on impact, releasing 2 moths that fly to their nearest target.
Moths that spawn closest to enemies are Arc and chase them, detonating on contact, dealing up to 525 [31 Guardians | 201 Objects] damage and blinding in a 4 meter radius.
Arc Moths count as Arc Grenade Damage.
Moths that spawn closest to the user or allies are Void and chase them much faster, granting 22.5 HP Void Overshield on contact.

armors.name: Necrotic Grip
armors.description:
Passively grants +30 Airborne Effectiveness to Weapons of Sorrow.
Melee Hits inflict Necrotic Poison.
Poisoned enemies spread Necrotic Poison on death in a 5 metre radius.
Necrotic Poison Damage ticks every 0.52 [0.7] seconds up to 19 [?] times over 10 [?] seconds, dealing 32 [5?] Kinetic Damage every tick, totalling 1366 [?] damage over its duration.
Poison damage deals more damage every tick, increasing by 11% per tick for the first 14 ticks, then increasing by an average of 41% per tick for the last 5 ticks.

armors.name: Nezarec's Sin
armors.description:
Void Kills grant Abyssal Extractors for 2.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 20 seconds.
While Abyssal Extractor is active:
300% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate.
200% Additional Base Class and Super Regeneration Rate.

armors.name: No Backup Plans
armors.description:
Passively grants +? Reload Speed and +30 Airborne Effectiveness to Shotguns.
While Void Overshield is active:
Shotguns are granted 35% [10%] increased damage.
Shotgun Kills refresh Void Overshield health and duration.
While a Void Super Ability is equipped:
Scoring 3 points grants a Void Overshield and begins Health Regeneration.
Rank-And-File = 1 Point | Anything Else = 2 Points

armors.name: Nothing Manacles
armors.description:
Grants an extra Scatter Grenade Ability Charge.
Scatter Grenades Submunitions receive drastically improved tracking and speed.
Scatter Grenade Kills spawn 4 additional Scatter Submunitions.

armors.name: Null Factor
armors.description: Abyssal Extractors

armors.name: Oathkeeper
armors.description:
Passively grants +40 Airborne Effectiveness and +10 Draw Time to Bows.
+10 Draw Time is equivalent to Draw Time Masterwork.
Bows can hold perfect draws indefinitely.
After 0.35 seconds of reaching full draw on a Primary Ammo Bow:
Grants increased damage every 0.5 seconds, up to 200% increased impact damage against Combatants after 2 seconds.
Broadhead, Poison, Stasis Crystals, Dragonfly/Explosive Head, and others are not affected.
Damage Buff disappears after holding full draw for 4 seconds.

armors.name: Omnioculus
armors.description:
Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Melee Ability Charge.
Void Invisibility grants 50% [10%] Damage Resist (Resist x4).
Upon bestowing an ally with Void Invisibility:
Grants 50% Melee Ability Energy per ally made invisible, up to 200% with 4 allies.
Allies begin Health Regeneration.
Allies share the Damage Resist Effect if made invisible by the Omnioculus Wielder.
Damage Resistance does not apply in Super.

armors.name: One-Eyed Mask
armors.description:
Upon receiving damage:
Highlights the first enemy that dealt damage for 8 seconds.
Only one enemy can be highlight at once.
Killing the highlighted enemy grants Vengeance, which is a 95HP Overshield, for 6 seconds.
Enemies cannot be highlighted while Vengeance is active.

armors.name: Ophidia Spathe
armors.description:
